Html:
I'm using Visual Studio 2010 and have included the reference for the agility pack.

 

I'm using the example from the codeplex page and VS 2010 is complaining that doc.DocumentElement does not exist and it does not appear in the object browser either.
Should be DocumentNode (I keep accidentally typing DocumentElement..). I think I might just add DocumentElement in 2.0 to be more in line with .NET XML namespace
Ah, thank you for the clarification. Further how would one access the <title> element of an html document?
